mapper.select: select * from (select a.id as id, b.article_id, a.word_name as wordName, a.ph_am as phAm, a.ph_an_mp3 as mp3, a.acceptation from word a join word_article_word_rel b on a.id = b.word_id and exists(select 1 from word_user_rel c where c.word_id = b.word_id) ) data ${ew.customSqlSegment}
